name: El Chavo
overview: Based on the animated show -- which is based on the phenomenal Mexican comedy -- El Chavo is a 4-player party board game with about 30 mini-games. For a fun time you can play "Libre" (Free Mode) or go for the glory on "Copa" (Cup Mode). This game as only distributed in Mexico and Brazil, and is usually sought after Wii game collectors due its relative rarity.
